K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:424b-1: shri rakta ya m'a ri tantra ra dza n'a ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:424b-3: dbal gshin rje gshed dmar po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:424b-4: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:424b-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i @425a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-1: bha ga rnams la bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-2: der bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba las shin tu gsang ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-5: phyag na rdo rje legs so legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-6: snying rje chen po byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying po gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sku nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-9: phyag na rdo rje gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-10: gshin rje 'joms pa po rnams ji snyed lags pa 'dir bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-11: gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-12: phra ma rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-13: 'dod chags rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-14: phrag dog rdo rje gshin rje gshed ces bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-15: rdo rje tsa rtsi ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-17: rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-18: rdo rje goo ri rnams kyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-19: zur du bum pa bzhi rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-20: de ltar rab tu bsor [?] ba'i gshin rje gshed kyi tshogs chen po rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bos par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425a-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-0: bdun thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang @425b thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung bar mdzad pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-1: sngags kyi dgug dang dbang chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-2: de bzhin nus pa rnam mang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-3: ral gri sgrub dang rgyal srid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-4: pha rol sde ni rnam 'joms dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-5: mi snang mig sman bcud nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-6: nges par grig la 'phrog par mkhas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-7: ro langs gnod sbyin sgrub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-8: sbrul dang gdug pa'i tshogs srung dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-9: sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor las rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-10: byang chub sems ni rnam dpyod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-11: nyer mkho thams cad spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-12: pha rol grong du rab 'jug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-14: rdo rje srung ba'i don bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-15: sa yi cha yang rdo rje yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-16: de bzhin ra ba dang ni gur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa po bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa thams cad kyi sa bon 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams las nges par phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-19: kshe ma me dang yatstsha na r'i dza do ru na yo ni ra ya yig la sogs pa gshin rje 'joms par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-20: gti mug kshe yig la brjod bya; ;phra ma nyid brjod ma yig la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-21: 'dod chags nyid kyang me yig la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-22: da yig la yang phrag dog yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-23: lnga rnams gshin rje 'joms par bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:425b-24: dza yig tsartsi ka ru brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-0: @426a *// sa yig la ni phag mo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-1: dbyangs can ma brjod do yig la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-2: ru yig la ni goo r'a ri 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-3: na yo ni ra zur bzhi ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-4: mi yi thod pa bzhi rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-5: de nas nges par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag gshin rje gshed rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-6: zhes sdang chen po'i rigs 'di sgom pa'i rnal 'byor 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-7: sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-8: blo bzang sems can don dang gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-9: byams sogs yon tan yang dag rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-10: dad dang thos pas rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-11: brtse ba'i bdag nyid can snga dro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-12: thog mar kha sogs dag byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-13: skye bos dben phyogs dur khrod sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-14: bde ba'i stan la rang brtsam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-15: rang nyid padmar nyi ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-16: rnam bkod shin tu gsal ba'i blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-17: de 'od rnams kyis sems can don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-18: phun tshogs byas nas spyan drangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-19: bla ma rdzogs sangs rgyas bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-20: ma lus mkha' dkyil rnams khyab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-21: dmigs te de rnams la ni phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-22: lus kyi tshogs kyis rnam par brtson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-23: tsartsi ka sogs rnams kyis mchod; ;de nas sdig pa rab bshags bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-24: lus ngag yid kyis yang dag sdig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-25: byas dang byed 'gyur de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426a-26: gang yang rjes su yi rang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-0: mgon po dus gsum @426b byas de bshags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-1: rdzags sangs rgyas dang mtshungs rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-2: bsod nams tshogs la rjes yi rang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-3: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dam chos bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-4: tshogs mchog rnams la skyabs su mchi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-5: yon tan rgya mtsho khyed rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-6: rang lus dag ni dbul bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-7: dam chos thams cad ston mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-8: shin tu mthar thug mjes par bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-9: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas dam chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-10: de nyid sbyin sogs rang bzhin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-11: sku gsum ye shes thob phyir du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-12: rab tu dang bas gnas par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-13: sems can rnams kyi don bsgrub phyir; ;rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-14: bsod nams yang dag nyer sgrub gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-15: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs bsngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-16: dpal ldan gshin rje mthar byed du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-17: gyur nas bdag gis 'gro phan bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-18: smon lam 'di ni btab byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-19: de dang de rnams blos gshegs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-20: brtse bas cho ga bzhin bltas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-21: sna tshogs stong par rnam bsam bya; ;sbyor ba bral ba'i rang bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-22: rgyu nyid kyis dang mtshan ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-23: rnam par rtog dang bral nyid phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-24: smon pa rnam par spangs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-25: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a n'a badzra sv'a bha wa a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-26: yam ram bam lam dkyil 'khor bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-27: bsdus pa'i bhrum yig las skyes pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-28: khang pa brtsegs pa bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-29: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:426b-30: rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-1: shal do shal phyod pas spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-2: lha dang lha mos legs par mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-3: sna tshogs rtse mo rlung bskyod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-4: bdan dril bu mnyam par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-5: de yi dbus gnas pam yig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-6: sna tshogs padma rnam bsam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-7: der ni lte ba'i dbus gnas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-8: sna tshogs rdo rje dbyug par bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-9: mtshan ma mtha' dag yongs gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-10: zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-11: padma nyi ma mnyam mnan cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-12: ma he dmar po'i steng bzhugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-13: g-yon brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-14: bdud rnams thams cad nges 'joms pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-15: nyi ma bye ba'i 'od ldan lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-16: ro langs ma yis mgrin mkhyud cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-17: dpa' bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-18: klu ni brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-19: spyan gsum dmar po 'jigs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-20: khrag ldan mgo bo'i phreng ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-21: g-yas na rdo rje dbyug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-23: khro bo zhal dang mnyam ldan zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-24: ljags 'dril mche ba gtsigs pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-25: khro gnyer ldan zhing sku rgyas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-26: stag gi pags pas rked pa g-yogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-29: ro langs ma yi g-yas pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-30: gri gug g-yon na thod pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-31: spyan gsum ldan zhing skra grol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427a-32: phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427b-0: mgo yi phreng ba @427b mnyam ldan zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427b-1: gtso bo'i mchu la myang ba mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427b-2: shar gyi 'dab ma la gti mug rdo rje dkar po rdo rje tsa rtsi k'a dang snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427b-3: lho'i 'dab ma la phra ma gshin rje gshed ser po rdo rje phag mo dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427b-4: nub kyi 'dab ma la 'dod chags gshin rje gshed dmar po rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427b-5: byang gi 'dab ma la phrag dog gshin rje gshed ljang gu rdo rje goo rvi dang snyoms par zhugs ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427b-10: g-yon pa na thod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427b-11: g-yas pa na gri gug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427b-15: dpa' bo ji lta ba bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427b-16: me'i zur du mu men gyi bum pa bzhi mnyam gyis gang ba'o; ;bden bral du gser gyi bum pa gla rtsis gang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427b-17: rlung du byi ru'i bum pa sihlas gang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427b-18: dbang ldan du dngul gyi bum pa ga bur gyis gang ba ste thod pas kha bcad pa rnam par sgom pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427b-19: khro bo 'ching ba'i sngags gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427b-21: aom hr'i: shtr'i: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427b-23: aom hoom kshoo ksha yam ka r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427b-24: grihna grihna h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427b-25: nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:427b-26: aom ma h'a yaksha se n'a dhi pa ta yo ma h'a dur d'anta da ma k'a ya n'a sha la n'a sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-0: bi dr'a pa ya bi dr'a pa ya h'um h'um phat @428a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-3: aom dve sha ra ti nu da nu da tru ta tru ta h'um dza: sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-5: aom mo h'a nta krita h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-6: aom pi shu n'anta krita h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-7: aom ra g'anta krita h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-8: aom a'i ra shyanta krita h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-10: aom mo ha ra ti h'um dza: aom pi shu na ra ti h'um: dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-11: aom r'a ga ra ti h'um: dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-12: aom aira shya ra ti h'um dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-13: dpa' bo'i dbang phyag [?] ma bzhi'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-14: aom marme marma bi gha te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-19: aom gho ne; su gho ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-22: sam bha ra sam bha ra h'um dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-23: aom marme marma ksho bha ni badzra sa ra sva ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-28: dhu na dhu na h'um aa mu kam dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-31: gha gha rakta sho ni ta bri ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-32: goo r'i ye aa mu kam dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-33: gdengs can mtha' yas sngon po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-34: skra bcings shin tu 'jigs par mdzad; ;klu ni 'jog po dmar po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-35: rna bar drag po'i rna rgyan byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-36: rigs ldan sna tshogs dpung pa'i rgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-37: gdengs can ser po dung skyong ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-38: lag gdub dag tu 'dzin pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-39: padma dkar po do shal mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-40: ka rko ta ni sngo bsangs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-41: mchod phyir thogs pas mdzes pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428a-42: gdengs can nor rgyas bdud rtsi yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-0: kha dog lta bu'i @428b ska rags byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-1: pad rtsa lta bu dkar ba'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-2: padma chen pos rkang gdub byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-3: thams cad phud kyi rnam pa sgrog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-4: lce gnyis phreng ba'i mche ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-6: gzugs can gshin rje gsod pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-7: rnam rtog thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-8: sngags kyis yang dag byin brlab bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-9: rang nyid sa bon lcags kyus dgug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-10: zhal nas zhugs te thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-11: mkha' khyab rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-12: zhal nas zhugs rnams snying gar zhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-13: der ni sa bon phyung byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-14: rdo rje'i lam nas zhu ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-16: sa bon rang bzhin can blta bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-17: sa bon de rnams kyis byin brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-19: mkhas pas cho ga bzhin bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-20: bltas te snying gar zhu byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-21: rdo rje'i lam nas nges phyung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-22: rang gi rig ma'i padma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-23: ze 'brur lha mo'i tshogs blta bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-24: me tog sna tshogs nyer spyod sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-25: lag pa'i yal gas bzung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-26: yid 'phrog klu yi mchod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-27: sna tshogs gar gyi rang bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-28: bde ba chen po rab ster ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-29: rol bcas de rnams kyis mchod bya; ;kye kye gshin rje gshed dmar po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-30: bla ma srin po'i gzugs rang bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-31: khyod mthong kho bo rnam bar 'jigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:428b-32: bla ma khro bo'i rang bzhin spongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-2: sa bla dang ni sa 'og g-yo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-3: chags pas brgyan pa'i khro bo yid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-4: gar mdzad khyod ni ro langs lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-5: sku ni dmar zhing thung ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-6: rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs sprul pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-7: rdo rje dbyangs can mas btud zhus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-8: gar mdzad khyod ni bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-9: hr'i: shti: gsang sngags dag gis khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-10: sa gsum po yi 'khrul pa sel; ;snying rje'i khro bo rje btsun khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-11: gar mdzad 'gro ba rnams la gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-12: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bha wa a'atma konyham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-13: sgra yi tshogs rnams thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-14: sgra brnyan dang mtshungs rnam par blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-15: 'khor lo'i gtso la bstod byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-16: de yis de rnams de lta bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-17: gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-18: shin tu 'jigs pa gshin rje gshed; ;ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-19: sku yi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-20: phra ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-21: shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje gshed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-22: thugs kyi rdo rje rab gsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-23: rin chen rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-24: 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-25: khyab bdag chags pa'i chos 'byung gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-26: dbyangs mchog kun gyi mchog gi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-27: gsung gi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-28: phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-29: las kun byed pa'i gshin rje gshed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429a-30: sku yi rdo rje rab gsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-0: phyag na ral gri khyod @429b phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-1: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-2: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-3: sangs rgyas kun rab mchog gi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-4: dkyil 'khor dbang phyug khyod phyag 'tshal; ;aa: yig las skyes padma'i snod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-5: mi mgo gsum gyi steng gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-6: dag par rnam par bskyed byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-8: zur gsum ram yig las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-10: sngon po g-yo ba gzhu lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-11: ba dan gyis mtshan yam las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-12: der ni de'i ming dang po las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-13: bskyed de rnam snang la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-14: dam yig sogs las yang dag byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-15: glang po che la sogs pa lngas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-16: h'um skye rdo rje'i kha chod kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-17: bkab pa mkhas pas bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-18: me la rlung gis bskyod pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-19: der ni zhu ba rnam bsam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-20: rdo rje'i ro mnyam dag gyur cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-21: shin tu dri ma med bltas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-22: h'um yig 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-23: spyan drangs ye shes rang bzhin can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-24: sngags kyi gzugs kyis rab gzhug cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-25: mchog gi bdud rtsi lngar bltas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-26: de nyid gsum gyis byin brlab bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-27: dkyil 'khor bdag po tshim bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-28: lce la rdo rje gtsang ma nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-29: h'um yig yang dag byung blta der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-30: de 'od sbu gu'i rnam pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-31: yang dag bkug pa de yis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-32: rdzogs sangs rgyas kun sna tshogs gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:429b-33: dkyil 'khor ba rnams de bzhin gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-0: @430a *// ye shes 'od kyis snying gar bkug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-1: kun tu rtog pa thams cad spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-2: thog ma tha ma dbus dbye bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-3: der yang gzung ba gcig yod min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-5: gang la 'khrul pa gnyis la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-6: thams cad tshe na sems 'khrul med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-7: lus ni spro dang sdud pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-9: mngon par rtogs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-11: las kyi dbye dang rab dbye las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-12: ji ltar sems can rab tu 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-13: rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-14: ye shes rgya mtsho rnams nyan 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-15: de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-16: nyes pa thams cad gso ba'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-17: las kun rab tu sgrub pa po; ;gsung ni 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje'i mthu mnga' ba la mchod pa byas te phyag 'tshal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-19: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung mnyan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430a-21: de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-3: bud med dbang byed phyir de bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-4: bsrung ba'i don du bya ba nyid; ;gi wang gzung bya zhi ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-5: gro ga de bzhin smyug shun la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-6: 'khor lo gnyis ni mngon bris te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-7: na ma: ming ni nang du spel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-8: nag po rtsa ba sogs spangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-9: kham phor gnyis ni kha sbyar la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-10: mar dang sbrang rtsi'i dbus bzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-11: srad bu dkar pos dkri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-12: me tog dkar pos thun gsum du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-13: shar du kha bltas mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-14: gshin rje mthar byed zla shel 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-16: bsgrub bya zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-17: zhen pa bltas te dbang bskur bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-18: bum pa dkar po zla 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-19: bdud rtsi lnga yis gang rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-20: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khrus byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-21: bltas nas bzlas pa brtsam bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-22: aom hr'i: shtr'i: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-23: na ma: lha sbyin la sh'antim ku ru na ma:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-24: zhi ba'i dam tshig gsungs pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-25: skyes pa rnams kyi zhi ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-26: gur gum gyis bris rgyas pa la'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-27: kha che rnams kyis 'khor lo gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-28: sv'a h'a ming gi nang du spel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-29: bsgrub bya'i ming ni blangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-30: mar dang sbrang rtsi'i dbus bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-31: kham phor kha sbyar du bzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-32: srad bu ser pos dkri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:430b-33: me tog ser pos thun gsum du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-2: gshin rje 'joms pa sku mdog ser //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-3: bdag nyid nges par blta bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-4: bsgrub bya ser po zla bar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-5: bum pa ser pos dbang bskur bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-6: dbang bskur ba ni bsgoms nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-7: rgyas par byed 'dod yang dag bzla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-8: aom hr'i: shtr'i: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-9: lhas sbyin gyi pushtim ku ru sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-10: boo sha ta aom hr'i: shtvr'i: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-11: boo sha ta lhas sbyin gyi bushtim ku ru boo sha ta ces gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyas pa'i dam tshig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-13: gro ga 'am yang na ras dag la; ;rgya skyegs khu ba 'am tsandan dmar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-14: ming med khrag dang bsres pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-15: 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-16: ho: yig gis ni nang du spel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-18: kham phor gnyis ni kha sbyar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-19: mar dang sbrang rtsis yongs gang bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-20: srad bu dmar pos dkri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-21: nub tu mngon par phyogs byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-22: me tog dmar pos mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-23: bdag nyid gshin rje 'joms pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-24: sku mdog dmar po cher 'bar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-25: bsgrub bya zla ba dmar po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-26: zhon pa nyid kyang rnam bsam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-28: dmar po lcags kyu'i dbyibs rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-29: bsgrub bya bkug par bsams nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431a-30: spro ba'i sngags ni khri bzla bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-0: de yis bsgrub bya @431b brgyal 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-1: rkang pa dag ni de bzhin 'gyel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-2: gos dang bral ba'i skra grol pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-3: bsams te bzlas pa brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-4: gal te dbang du ma gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-5: bud med seng ldeng me la ni; ;mar sogs dor bcas brtul zhugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-6: 'khor lo de ni gdung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-7: aom hr'i: shtr'i: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-8: ho: lhas sbyin gyi mchod sbyin ba shim ku ru ho:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-9: aom hr'i: shtr'i: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-10: boo sha ta lhas sbyin gyi ba sh'a m'a na mchod sbyin boo shat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang du bya ba'i dam tshig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-13: dur khrod ras sam yang na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-14: rang byung bskus pa'i ras dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-15: rgya skyegs sga rlon khrag bsres pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-16: 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-17: dza: yig dang ni hr'i: yig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-18: bsgrub bya'i ming ni nang spel bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-19: btsun mo'i padma'i snod du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-20: kha sbyar bzhag ste mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-21: srad bu dmar pos dkris nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-22: me tog dmar pos mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-23: bdag nyid gshin rje gshed po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-24: mtshams kyi nyi ma ltar 'bar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-25: lcags kyu kha dog dmar po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-26: bsgrub bya bkug pa nyid bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-27: lcags kyu rnams kyis snying phug cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-28: zhags pas rked pa la bcings te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-29: rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-30: seng+ge dmar bo mnyam zhon pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-31: rdzas lnga yis ni gsang bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:431b-32: de ni 'ong bar rnam bsam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:432a-2: seng ldeng shing me 'bar ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:432a-4: der ni bzlas pa yang dag brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:432a-5: aom hr'i: shtri wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat hr'i: a'a mu ka a'a karsha ya hr'i:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:432a-6: aom hr'i: shtr'i: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:432a-7: dza: lhas sbyin a'a karsha ya dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:432a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'gugs pa'i dam tshig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:432a-10: blo ldan dur khrod ras ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:432a-11: yung ba yi ni khu ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:432a-12: 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:432a-13: lam yig gis ni nang du spel //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:432a-15: kham phor kha sbyar du bzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:432a-16: kham phor ser po steng bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:432a-17: der ni mkhas pas ri mo bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:432a-18: dang po ri mo bzhi bcu bdun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:432a-19: mnyam par bzhag ste mnyam bri bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:432a-20: lcog brgyad du grags ri rab ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:432a-21: de yi steng du yang dag bri //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-0: @433b mthar byed lto ba'i nang na gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-1: tsher ma rnams kyis lus gang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-2: gdos dang sgrog gis rkang par bsdams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-3: de bzhin dum bu dum bur byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-4: phags pa med par byas bsams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-5: ske tshe dang ni lan tshvas byug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-6: s'id yig brjid pas bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-7: de yi lus kyi srung ba sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-8: bcangs nas bdag mdun dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-9: de yi go cha bgos byas te; ;stong pa'i lus bzhin bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-10: bdag lus las byung gshin rje gshed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-11: khro bos bdag nyid sku rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-12: de ni gdung bar bsgom bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-13: zhag dang tshil dag 'thung bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-14: de mdun gshin rje bsam bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-15: lag na dbyug pa stobs po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-16: gdug pa de yis gdungs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-17: ma rungs de la rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-18: de yi nang grol blang bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-19: bya rgod kyis khyer mkha' dkyil 'gro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-20: klu rnams kyis ni sa 'og dgug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-21: dran med la sogs rnam par gzir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-22: de ltar bsgrub bya rnam bsams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-23: sems ni snying rjes nges 'khyud pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-24: 'khor ba las ni bton byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-25: sangs rgyas zhing rnams su skyes 'gyur //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-28: gsod pa gsod pa ma yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:433b-29: ci srid sdig pa las grol ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434a-1: pa stong phrag rnams byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434a-2: mnar med sogs par gnas 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434a-3: ae ma sangs rgyas bdag nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434a-4: gsod pa byang chub thob par mdzad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434a-5: slar yang snying rje rnam mdzad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434a-6: gsad 'os sems can gsod par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434a-7: ae ma snying rje mchog gi stobs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434a-8: snying rje dman pas mi 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434a-9: aom hr'i: shtr'i: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434a-10: h'um de ba dattamm m'a ra ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434a-11: aom hr'i: shtr'i: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat/

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam par rtog ba chen po gsod pa'i rdo rje 'khrul 'khor dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434a-19: bsgrub bya'i ming ni blangs byas te //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434a-22: sdang ba'i sems kyis nyin phyed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434a-23: dur khrod rnams su sba bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434a-24: gshin rje mthar byed du yang dmigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434a-25: mdun du bsgrub bya dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434a-26: rta dang ma he mnyam zhon pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434a-27: lag na mtshon thogs de gnyis dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434a-31: gnyis po de dag dbyug 'gyed par //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-2: aom hr'i: shtr'i: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat/

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-7: 'khor lo gnyis ni bri bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-8: h'um dang phat yig rnam spel bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-9: thod pa kha sbyar du bkod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-10: srad bu nag pos yang dag dkris //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-11: ma mo'i tshal rnams su sba bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-12: gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-13: mdun du bsgrub bya rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-14: yam byung rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-15: nag bo gzhu yi rnam pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-16: rnga mo chen po mdog sngon po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-17: de yi steng du rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-18: de la ma rungs che bskyon te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-19: lho yi phyogs su de khyer la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-20: khro tshogs rnams kyis gdungs pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-21: nges par sangs rgyas rnams kyang skrod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-22: aom hr'i: shtr'i: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-23: de ba dattam autstsha ta ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyi bskrad pa chen po'i dam tshig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-26: khros pa gshin rjer bltas rnal 'byor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-27: khrag bcas ro bsregs thal ba dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-32: gshin rje'i lus gnas bsad ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:434b-33: rta dang ma he dag las dbye //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435a-2: rgyas pa zla ba ser po la //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435a-8: kha che yi ni bye brag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435a-9: gro ga'i 'dab ma la bris dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435a-11: kham por kha sbyar du bzhag ste //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435a-13: bya rog sgro yi smyug gu yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435a-14: nyi ma'i gung la nges par brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435a-15: ro bsregs padma kha sbyar la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435a-16: gshin rje gshed bdag rnal 'byor las //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435a-18: lho ru gnas pa'i tshar gcod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435a-19: zhi la mtha' yi yi ge yam//

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435a-23: sngon du bsnyen pa khri bzlas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435a-24: las 'di rab tu sgrub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435a-25: gshin rje gshed dmar rab sbyor las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435a-26: ye shes rdo rje yis bya ste //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-0: 'khrul 'khor gyi dbang du byas pa'i le'u ste @435b gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-1: ri bo skye bos dben phyogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-2: legs sbas yid brtag khyim rnams so //
