K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-6: khrag 'gugs pa yi rab sbyor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-7: ca rtsi k'a sgom rnal 'byor pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje chen po 'joms pa'i rdo rje khrag 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rdo rje tsa rtsi k'a'i sngags 'di dag gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-9: aom badzra tsa rtsi ke siddhi ndra n'i la h'a ri ni ratna tra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-10: aa pa ka ri ne ru dhi ram aa karsha ya dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-11: kha ni rab tu gdangs bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-12: sngags 'di rjes su dran par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-13: khams gsum pa yi khrag chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-14: 'dir ni gugs par the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshed pos chang dgug pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-16: rdo rje phag mos chang dgug pa'i dam tshig 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-17: aom gho ne su gho ne badzra m'a ma k'i bha ra bha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-19: tryee dh'a tu ka ma dya a'a karsha ya dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-20: rdza mkhan lag pa phyis pa'i sas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-21: bum pa byas ta kun nas bsgribs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-22: rkun po'i skra yi gzhir bzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-23: sngags ni rjes su dran par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-24: pandi tas ni mchod rten du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:435b-25: sngags 'di'i bdag nyid che ba bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-0: @436a *// 'bad pas brtan par dmigs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-1: chang dgug pa ni rab tu 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje chen po 'joms pa'i rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-3: dbyangs can mas sngags 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-4: aom pi tsu pi tsu pra dzny'a wardha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-6: me dh'a wardha ni; dhi ri dhi ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-8: bzung nas ji srid tshes gcig nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-9: kun nas zla ba rdzogs pa'i bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-10: legs sbyar byed 'dod brtsam bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-11: ji srid zla ba'i rjes 'jug las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-13: de nas tshigs bcad brgya phyed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-14: khams gsum pa ni ma lus shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-15: ma lus lus pa med par 'khrugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das mthar byed chen po 'joms pa'i rdo rje'i khu ba 'gugs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te khu ba 'gugs pa goo r'is sngags 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-17: aom a'a karsha ni a'a karsha ni goo r'i dza:hri: dushta pra dushta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-18: shu kra a'a karshta ya dza: dza: h'um sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-19: mkha' sgo rdo rje lam dang rlung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-20: dril bu lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-21: bzlas dang sgom par rab sbyor las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-22: khu ba'i tshogs rnams 'gugs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-23: dben pa'i nags khrod rnams su yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436a-24: las 'di rab tu bsgrub bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-0: mtshan mo bdun @436b gyi rab sbyor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed chen bo dus 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te dbang bskur ba mchog gi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams las nges par phyung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-3: au dum wa ra mand'a ra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-4: pa ri dz'a ta kam m'a li ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-5: karna ka ra'i phreng ba yang; ;bu khyod zungs la byin gyis rlobs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-6: khams gsum pa yi ral gri che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-7: sangs rgyas thams cad phyag mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-8: bzung nas bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-9: las kyi ral gri dang mtshungs mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-10: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-11: rdo rje dril bu bsgrub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-12: mnyes shing gsang ba'i rdo rje zung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-13: khyod ni slob ma bsdu bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-14: 'di ni btung ba rin chen te; ;'grub pa'i lus ni rab sgrub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-15: skyes bu byung ba'i chu 'thungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-16: mnyes gshin kun tu ye shes nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-17: slob ma'i kha yis btung bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-18: gshin rje gshed ni rab bsgrub phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-19: rdo rje slob ma bdag nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-20: sems ni shin tu dga' bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-22: sngags kyi dgug pa'i rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-23: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:436b-24: ral gri'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-1: lan lcags kyi rang bzhin las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-2: ral gri yang na dngul chu yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-3: byed byas khru gang tshad kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-4: ral gri rnam bsam brtul zhugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-5: bcu bzhi yang na brgyad pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-6: dur khrod dbus su gzung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-7: bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-8: thun gsum khri phrag bzla bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-9: zla ba so so'i bcu bzhi las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-10: gtor ma mchod pa sngon 'gro bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-11: zla ba gcig gis 'bum phrag bzla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-13: grub nas ral gri rab tu 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-14: snang ba chen po'i 'od zer lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-16: 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal mi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-17: 'jigs byed gshin rje gshed sbyor las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-18: gang tshe ral gri grub rnal 'byor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-19: rtsed rmod sa ni grub byed de'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-20: g-yul du de yi bzod par dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-21: rkang pa gnyis dang rkang bzhi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-22: blta phyir phyogs bcu rnams su 'gro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-23: lha dang lha min rnams mi bzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-24: mi yi 'jig rten smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-25: rgya mtsho'i 'jim pa blangs byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-26: zla ba gcig gis yang dag bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-27: aom phu'i:yi ge snying gar dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-28: hr'i:shtr'i: la sogs sngags bzla bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-29: char pa mi 'bab dus rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-31: sbrul nag dag gi sha rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-32: nim pa'i lo mas bsres byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437a-33: de yis ri lur byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-0: rgya @437b mtshor zhugs byas brtul zhugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-1: khri khrag tsam zhig rab bzlas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-2: chu rlabs rengs pa'i mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-3: gtum po sa bon brgya blangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-4: sran ma 'bras dang bsres pa ni; ;'bum phrag bdun du rab bzlas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-5: lha ni sbyin sreg las gzigs 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-6: dur khrod kyis ni gso ma blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-7: gzugs brnyan bya ba brtul zhugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-8: smyo byed khu bas byug pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-9: khri khrag gcig gis 'gugs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-10: 'bum phrag bzhi ni bzlas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-11: don grub sa bon kun bsags pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-12: gnyid log langs te bya ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-13: tshor bar yang ni the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-14: rgyun lam gyi ni sa blangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-15: sngags ni 'bum phrag bzlas pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-16: spyi bor rab tu byugs tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-17: spyi bo'i nad ni rnam par 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-18: lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-19: lag pas spyi bor mnye bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-20: nad kyis nyams pa med 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-21: 'dir ni the tshom yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-22: bram ze yi ni sha dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-23: dur khrod thal ba sa des ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-24: gshin rje gshed kyi sku gzugs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-25: phyag gnyis dang ni zhal gcig pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-26: g-yas pa rdo rje chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-27: de bzhin g-yon na mi mgo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-28: sku mdog dkar po 'jigs byed chen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-29: de yis ma rungs 'joms par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-30: sha dang bdud rtsi lnga yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-31: nyi ma so sor gtor ma dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-32: rtag tu gsol btab rnal 'byor pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:437b-33: bdag gi dgra bo 'joms par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-3: yang na na bar 'gyur ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-4: myos pa la sogs kun tu 'khrug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-5: dgra bo'i rnam snang blang bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-6: mi yi rkang ni rab bkang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-7: 'bum phrag bzlas pas rdzogs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-8: shing gi rtse mor sbyang bya nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-9: rtag tu yi dvags tshal du bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-10: rnal 'byor dbang phyug mnyes na bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-11: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-12: ro langs chen po'i sgrub thabs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-13: thams cad 'grub par byed pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-14: sna tshogs bya ba rab sgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-16: 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-17: de nas rgyal srid sgrub thabs mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-18: 'di las yang dag rab bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-19: 'phyang ba'i shing ni gzung bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-20: ma nyams de bzhin rma med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-21: blangs la gdud par bya de yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-22: bzlas pa'i phreng bar rab bsgrub bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-23: zla ba zla ba'i bcu bzhi la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-24: sha lnga yis ni byug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-25: bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-26: bzlas pa 'grub par byed pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-29: ae ma sngags kyi nus pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-30: gnyid log sgra ni sgrog par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-31: gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438a-32: skad cig kyang ni 'jigs mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-0: gang gang 'dod @438b pa'i rnal 'byor pas de dag thams cad thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-1: ma he dang ni chu srin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-2: stag dang de bzhin gzhan rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-3: dom dang lce spyang dag dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-4: spre'u yang ni bye brag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-5: sked tshe lan tshva de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-6: shoo bh'a dza na tshva ba gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-7: 'di yis sku gzugs yang dag bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-8: 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gshin rje gshed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-9: de la gsol btab rnal 'byor pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-10: hr'i:shtr'i: la sogs sngags bzlas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-11: rgyal po cha ge bsad nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-12: bdag de rengs par sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-14: bden zhing bden par the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-15: de nas gzhan yang rgyal zla yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-16: dkar phyogs nyi ma bsgrubs ldan tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-17: rdul ldan gos ni yang dag blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-18: thang sku mchog ni bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-19: bri bya bkra shis mchog snag tsha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-20: chen po yang dag ldan rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-21: sku mdog dkar bo drag shul che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-22: phyag gnyis dang ni zhal gcig mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-23: g-yas pa rdo rje 'bar ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-25: zhabs ni g-yon brkyang rnam 'gyur dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-26: rin chen cod pan rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-27: rin chen rgyan rnams yongs su rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-29: gsod pa'i bsam pas rgyal po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-30: 'og gi cha la nges par sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-31: thun mong kha dog yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-32: ji lta'i dbyibs ni rnam par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-33: 'dus byas lha ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:438b-34: ji ltar 'byor pa'i tshad la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-0: @439a *// de yi mdun du sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-1: nges par zur gsum dkyil 'khor la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-2: sbyin sreg 'bum gyis de rgyal srid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-4: de nas gzhan yang zla gzas bzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-5: gal te nyi ma la blta bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-6: dur khrod thal ba yang dag blangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-7: gzugs brnyan bya ba brtul zhugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-8: shr'im g'i r'a dz'i sha lnga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-9: nim pa dha du ra'i lo mas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-10: mkhas pas cho ga 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-11: gcig tu byas te gzugs brnyan bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-12: sku mdog sngon po drag shul che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-13: phyag gnyis dang ni zhal gcig pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-14: ma he la bzhugs rnam 'gyur zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-15: rdo rje dang ni thod pa 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-16: bsgrubs te sku gzugs rang bzhin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-17: mchod pa byas na slar yang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-18: rgyun du hr'i: shtr'i: la sogs sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-19: 'bum phrag bzlas te mnyes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-20: sde bcas g-yog 'khor bcas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-21: rgyal po che ge gzhom bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-23: byas nas 'bum phrag khyad par las; ;mchod pa'i las ni yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-24: bzlas pa'i sbyin sreg cho ga 'dis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-25: sems can don mchog blo dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-26: rgyal srid thob 'gyur the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-27: de nas gzhan yang bkra shis kyi ras la rdo ba'i nam mkha'i chus zla mtshan gyi gos bkrus te thang sku mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439a-28: zhal gcig pa dang phyag gnyis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-0: sku mdog nag po @439b 'jigs rung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-1: dbu skra 'bur ba yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-2: mgo bo'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-3: gri gug dang ni thod pa phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-4: ma he'i steng du bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-5: de ni sgom pa brtsams byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-6: dgra yi mdun du rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-7: gri gug gis ni bcad byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-8: tshil dang zhag rnams 'thung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-9: rgyu ma rnams dang 'jim pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-10: khrag ni mang po 'thung bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-12: yang na rma yis snying gar gzir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-13: de nas gzhan yang mi'i rus pa sor bzhi pa blangs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-14: hr'i: shtr'i: la sogs pa'i sngags nang du spel ba dgra bo'i sgor mnan pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-15: gal te brgya byin dang mtshungs pa'ang 'khor dang bcas pa skrod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-16: gcig pur skye bos dben par 'dug ste rje btsun gyi thang sku bkram nas phyogs bcu na zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-17: byang chub sems dpa' rnams mdun du byas nas mi'i rus pa bcad pa'i khrag chen po dang bsres pa'i bya rog gi khrag gis sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-18: rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo la sa bon bcu gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-19: de nyid du dgra bo'i ming dbus su spel la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-20: tsheg drag dang bcas pa'i kha sbyar ba tha yig gsum gyis phyi rol tu bskor ba bya rog gi mgrin par btags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-21: gal te 'bab chu la bskyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:439b-23: de kho na ltar sa bon bcu gnyis bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440a-1: phat h'um h'um na na t'a kri wi shtr'i:hr'i: aom//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440a-2: ji ltar 'byor pas mchod byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440a-3: stobs po che yi bdug pa phul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440a-4: gal te 'bab chu la bskyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440a-5: de gzhung du med do; ;gal te ma gyur na bya rog gi gshog pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas dgra bo'i sgo nang du ming dang spel ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440a-6: 'phral du 'khor dang bcas pa skrod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440a-7: de kho na ltar rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su tsha ba gsum dang dug dang ske tshe rnams rus pa chen po'i 'bri smyug gis me'i sa bon gyi dbus su tsheg drag dang bcas pa'i gha:yig gnyis kha sbyar ba'i tha yig gsum gyis phyi rol tu bskor ba'i me'i bud shing gi me la gdung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440a-8: de'i skad cig la bu dang chung ma dang g-yog 'khor dang bcas pa 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440a-10: rgyal srid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440a-11: de nas pha rol sde rnams 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440a-12: 'di las yang dag rab bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440a-13: bram ze mo yi rdul gos la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440a-14: rgyal dang nyi mas yang dag brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440a-15: ma he'i zhal gyi thang sku bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440a-16: brgya phrag phyag ni rab gsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440a-17: de ni phyag mtshan rnon po bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440a-18: thams cad du ni bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440a-19: thang sku dkar bo bri bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-0: padma dkar pos @440b mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-1: sngags kyi bzlas pa 'bum phrag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-2: byas te de bzhin padma slar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-3: thang sku bkram pa mngon phyogs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-4: ba dan steng du 'dzin pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-5: rkang gnyis rkang bzhi la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-6: skye bo rnams kyis mthong gyur gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-7: de nas thams cad gdong gzhan 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-8: seng+ge mthong ba'i glang po bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-10: tshangs pa'i sa bon mar khu che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-11: ku d'a ra tstshin gyis ldan ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-12: rnga mo'i gcin gyis yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-13: ril bu bya 'o brtul zhugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-14: rang gi gdong par thig le bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-15: pha rol sde ni rnam par 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-16: aa shvi ka shing rtsar song ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-17: brgyad pa'am yang na bcu bzhi la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-18: thun gsum du ni zla ba gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-20: aom siddhi aa nanta n'a la h'a ri ni pa ra syee n+ya ba n'i sha ni hr'i:sv'ah'a; 'di nyid kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-21: mthong ba las pha rol gyi sde rnam par 'joms shing gang la bltas pa de 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-23: shing gcig rtsa bar phyin nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-24: mchog gi ro la 'dug byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-25: g-yas na ral gri 'dzin pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-26: g-yen brkyang ba yi zhal gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-27: hr'i:shtr'i: la sogs pa'i sngags mtshan mo mtha' dag bzla bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:440b-28: de'i tshe ral gri yongs su 'phro zhing de'i tshe pha rol gyi sde rnams srung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed @441a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441a-2: pha rol gyi sde rnam par 'joms pa'i le'u ste drug pa 'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441a-3: de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441a-4: mi snang 'grub par rab gsal mdzad; ;thog mar mi snang bsgrub pa'i don du rnal 'byor pas rgyal dang nyi ma'i nyin mo brtsam zhing sngon du yang dag par btags la 'bum phrag bzla bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441a-6: gzas bzung ba'i dus nas pa ni ta ka ri'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441a-9: ae ra ba da'i rtsa ba dang thams cad gcig tu byas te ril bu byas nas khar bcug na mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441a-10: de bzhin du gzhan yang kho ti dz'a la dza ya na ti dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441a-11: briddha ra ka'i rtsa ba dang thams cad mnyam por gcig tu byas te bhe ga'i gcin la nyi ma gsum bskams la ril bu byas nas khar bcang bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441a-13: de nas gzhan yang nyi ma gzas bzung ba'i dus na aulk'i'i mchu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441a-15: dha du ra ka na ka h'a ya nyid ba da bhi'i gcin gcig la yang dag par bzhag ste ril bu byas nas khar bcug na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441a-17: de nas gzhan yang byi ba'i mig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441a-19: sa 'og skyong bas kyang cha mnyam por gcig tu byas pa'i ril bu bshang lam du gzhug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441a-20: skad cig de las de mi mthong bar 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441b-0: de nas yang @441b nyi ma'i res la byi ba'i mig rab tu blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441b-1: rams dang tsi tra ka sngon po'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig bya rgod kyi khag gis btags par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441b-3: de nas gzhan yang p'a sh'i m'an sa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441b-5: ba h'um ra pha la bsnyams te dar gos kyis dkris nas bram ze'i thod pa la me lce'i dreg pa 'chags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441b-6: de'i mig sman gyis mig gnyis la byug na mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441b-7: de nas gzhan yang gdol pa'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441b-9: 'dab bzang gi mig rnams ril bu byas te khar bcug na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441b-10: de mis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441b-11: de nas gzhan yang 'dab bzang blangs la nyi ma bdun gyi bar du dngul chu ma sh'a gcig byas te bza' bar bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441b-12: des brun du gyur ba gang yin pa de dang lhan cig bdag nyid kyi khu bas thig le byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441b-15: mi snang ba'i rab tu bya ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441b-16: mig sman bshad bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441b-17: thog mar re zhig mig sman gyi don du bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags 'bum phrag lnga yongs su bzlas te mig sman sgrub pa brtsam par bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441b-18: dung dang bya rgod dang ku ra ra rnams kyi mig blangs te ma nyams nas sa 'og gi sbrang rtsi'i khu ba la dar gos kyi sdong bus dreg pa 'chags par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441b-19: gang gis 'di'i mig sman byugs ba tsam gyis sa'i bu ga mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:441b-20: skar ma lag la bri ha ti dkar po'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442a-0: @442a *// dza yant'i nag po'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442a-1: lce spyang gi mig bsnyams te sbrang rtsis lhan cig btags nas thig le byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442a-2: sa'i bu ga mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442a-3: bh'u mi la ta'i til mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442a-4: bi sham ka ra'i rtsa ba'i khu bar dza dang bcas pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442a-5: dar gos la gzhon nu mas byas pa'i srad bus dkris nas sdong bu byas te mi'i thod pa la dreg pa 'chags par byas la mig sman byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442a-6: nges par gter mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442a-7: de nas gzhan yang rgyal gyi zla ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442a-8: skar ma snubs la zla mtshan gyi gos blangs te brgyad pa'am bcu bzhi pa la rdo rje tsa rtsi ka'i thang sku mngon par bris la mchod pa chen po byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442a-9: mtshan mo 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na nges par rmi lam gyi gter mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442a-10: de nas gzhan yang shing ni ma pa'i rtser song ste brgyad pa'am bcu bzhi pa la thang sku'i mdun du tsartsi ka bsams nas lce spyang gi mgo'i steng du khri phrag bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442a-11: tsartsi ka drung du 'ongs nas bdag gis ci bya 'dri bar 'gyur zhing sgrub pa pos bdag la mig sman gyi grub pa rab tu stsol ces pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442a-12: bdag la ro'i bcud len stsol ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442a-13: gi wang dang lce spyang gi mig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442a-15: shing ta la'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442a-16: sbrang rtsi mnyam pa rnams mkhas pas ril bu bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442a-17: 'dis mig sman byas pa'i mig ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442b-0: sa'i bu ga @442b mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442b-3: ku ra ra'i mig rnams de kho na ltar g-yon pas g-yon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442b-4: g-yas pas g-yas pa bzung ste til mar chen pos dreg pa 'chags par bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442b-5: 'dis mig sman byas pa'i mig ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442b-6: sa'i bu ga mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442b-7: de nas gzhan yang gi wang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442b-11: de bzhin du ha ram byin nas brtag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442b-12: 'dis mig sman byas na sa'i bu ga mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442b-14: grub pa sna tshogs gnas kyi don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442b-15: nor dang 'bru sogs phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442b-16: lcags brgyad 'joms shing nam mkha' la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442b-17: spyod pa nyid kyang ster bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442b-18: sngon du bsnyen pa'i don du sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas nas dngul chu'i sgrub thabs brtsam par bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442b-19: thog mar dngul chu blangs te tsi tra ka dmar po'i khu bas bsnur bar bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442b-20: de'i rjes la zangs kyi khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442b-21: gser gyi phye ma byin nas sh'a kho da'i khu bas bzhi cha tshad kyi nor bu bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442b-23: ldong ros kyis mnyam por btags te kong bu kha sbyar gyi nang du ra dza byin nas bsro bar bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442b-24: gong bu gyur pa phyed mar byas nas ra ti'i tshad kyis zangs 'joms shing gser dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:442b-25: ro 'di dag til mar chen pos bsnur nas lhang tsher dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-0: mu zis til mar chen po nyi ma gsum btso bar bya @443a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-1: ste; ji srid slar gong bur gyur gyi bar du 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-2: sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig cung zad zos pa la skyes bu lo stong phrag tu 'tsho bar 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-3: dngul bcos nas gser du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-4: gzhan yang b'a hl'a ba'i khu ba byin nas dngul chu bsnur bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-5: ji srid gong bur gyur gyi bar du 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-6: sha t'a la dang dzambhi ra'i khu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-7: sh'a kho da ka'i 'bras bu'i shun pa so sor mnyam por byin nas kong bu'i nang du bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-8: de nyid kyis rab tu byug par bya zhing bskams la phyi nas kong bur bsreg par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-9: myur du gong bu'i tshad du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-10: ra ti gnyis kyi tshad kyi nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig ji srid par lo ma dang skyur po spangs shing thams cad du bud med bsten pa yang spang bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-11: skyes bu lo stong phrag bcu gnyis su 'tsho zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-12: mkha' la spyod pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-13: bam ga bcom na sa dngul chur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-14: de nas gzhan yang ran dz'a ni la'i khu bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-15: su pa ra na m'akshi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-16: pashte sa ra ta'i rtsa ba mnye bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-18: na ra do ni'i khu bas god bur bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-19: kong bu'i nang du bzhag nas pha ri'i til mar la sbyar bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-20: zla ba drug gis gong bur 'gyur na lcags brgyad rnams nges par gser du 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-21: zos pas mkha' la sbyod pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443a-22: mthong ba dang reg pa tsam gyis lo lnga brgya rnams su 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443b-0: @443b de nas gzhan yang dngul chu ku ma ri'i khu bas bsnur bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443b-2: ba l'a sha'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443b-3: n'a ga ke sha ra'i shun pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443b-6: de bzhin du slar ba da'i 'o ma dang mnyam pos bsro bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443b-7: thun gnyis kyis gong bur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443b-8: cung zad zos pa tsam gyis nges par sa gsum du 'gro bar byed cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443b-9: ra ti tsam gyis nges par zangs srang gser du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443b-10: de nas gzhan yang dngul chu shr'i khanda'i so dzu'i 'o mas cung zad mnyes te mu zi dang zangs kyi snod du dzambhi ra'i khu bas mnye zhing nyi 'od la bskam par bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443b-11: gong bur gyur pa kong bu'i nang du bzhag ste thun gnyis su bsro bar bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443b-12: su ki ti'i kong bur bcug la ra ti'i tshad kyis dbug par bya ste zangs bcom nas gser du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443b-13: lus kyi yang mnyer ma dang skra dkar spong zhing phan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443b-14: de nas gzhan yang dngul chu ba la'i rtsa bar bsnur bar bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443b-15: slar yang gdol pa'i me tog gi khu bas bsnur bar bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443b-16: slar yang skan tsa ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443b-17: ba ha ri'i khu ba la bsnur bar bya' o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443b-18: de'i la ra ti'i tshad kyi gser gyi phye ma byin nas gong bur bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443b-19: 'dab ma bdun pa'i kong bu'i nang du kun dz'a ra'i rkang pa'i tshad kyis dum bu byin na gong bur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443b-20: de blangs te ra ti'i tshad kyis zangs 'joms shing gser du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:443b-21: lus la'ang ra ti'i tshad kyis skyon gsum 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444a-3: zos ba tsam gyis rgyang grags su 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444a-4: de nas gzhan yang dngul chu snod du bzhag ste rdo ba'i gzhi la bsnur zhing tri hri'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444a-6: b'a th'a'i rtsa bas bsnur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444a-7: gong bu byas nas kong bu'i nang du bzhag ste mtshan mo mtha' dag par bsre bar bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444a-8: de nas rdzogs par 'dus byas te ra ti'i tshad kyi cho ga la zangs 'joms pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444a-9: zos na ra ti'i tshod kyis skra dkar dang gnyer ma spong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444a-10: zla ba drug gi rab tu sbyor ba las lo stong phrag rnams su 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444a-11: de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba nyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444a-12: dngul chu srang gcig blangs nas shing+ga be ra'i khu bas bsnur bar bya 'o; ;lhang tsher dang gser cung zad dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444a-13: shing+gi dmar po dang mnyam pos ga d'a ya'i khu ba blangs te nges par zhag bcu gnyis rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444a-14: de'i rjes la kod bu'i nang du bzhag ste bso bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444a-16: de nas blangs te ra ti'i tshad kyis yang dag par blangs la gzhug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444a-17: zangs ma lus bcom nas nges par gser du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444a-18: zos nas mkha' la spyod pa nyid thob cing lo stong du 'tsho bar the tshom med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444b-0: gnod sbyin dang mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnams kyis bsten cing gshin rje'i 'jig rten @444b rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444b-1: de nas gzhan yang lhang tsher nag po srang gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444b-2: bha ka dang parna dang dngul chu dang ldan ba rnams kyis zla ba phyed du sbyar te rtsi bo che dang ro mnyam du byas pa za ba'i tshad kyis chu grang mo dang yang dag par ldan par bza' bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444b-3: zla ba sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas bdag nyid rgas pa dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444b-4: de nas gzhan yang lcags srang gang tsam blangs te ra gan phye mar byas te ka shi'i khu bas mnyam par ldan pa me lce'i 'od zer la bskam par bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444b-5: dngul chu dang mu zi rnams der bzhi cha'i tshad sbyar ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444b-7: li shi'i phye ma rnams phyed dang gnyis snga ma'i tshad las te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444b-8: thams cad gcig tu byas la rdo ba'i gzhi la lcags bsnur bar bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444b-9: gser kong bur bzhag nas bsro bar bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444b-10: de nas blangs te lcags chen po zla ba'i tshad kyis bza' bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444b-11: skra dkar dang gnyer ma rnams 'joms shing rgas pa dang 'chi ba med par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444b-13: mi snang ba la sogs kyi le'u bdun ba'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444b-14: de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos grib ma 'phrog pa'i rab tu dbye ba gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:444b-15: rkang gnyis dang rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi dgra bo tshar gcod ba'i phyir rab tu sbyor ba 'di brjod par bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-1: sems can thams cad rmongs par bya ba'i phyir dpa' bo gshin rje gshed bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-2: rang khyim rnams sam mtshan mo'i dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-3: stag wags gdan la 'dug byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-4: zhal gcig dmar po mi bzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-5: zhags pa dang ni lcags kyu 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-6: ro la bzhugs pa drag shul che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-7: spyan gsum shin tu 'jigs rung pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-8: thams cad rmongs par byed pa'i lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-9: mi bzad pa yi me stag 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-11: phyi nas cho ga kun spyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-12: k'a ra b'i ra dkar rtsa ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-13: de bzhin dant'i dmar rtsa ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-14: sbal pa'i khrag gis bsnur byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-15: thig le bcang bya brtul zhugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-16: gang gi grib ma 'phrog byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-17: rkang pa de yang rmongs pas 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-18: rkang gnyis rkang bzhi thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-19: rmongs par 'gyur bar the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-20: nyi ma rengs dang dkar phyogs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-21: srin bu lto ba nas skyugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-22: rab tu 'bad pas de blangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-23: rva co yis ni thig le bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-24: dpral bar thig le byin byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-25: gang gi grib ma 'phrog bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-27: 'o ma rnams kyis rab dkrus dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-28: dant'i ro ha au ha rashti'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-29: rtsa ba 'di rnams skam mnyam par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-30: bya rog khrag gis bsnur nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445a-31: thig le bya'o brtul zhugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-0: thig le 'di yis byin rlabs @445b kyis; ;lha yang rab tu bskyod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-1: nges par som nyi mi bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-2: bya ba la yang rmongs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-3: de bzhin rab tu sbyor ba gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-4: ra sa shring+gi ku th'a r'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-5: pha n'i na ga pa n'i dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-6: 'di rnams kun gyi sha bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-7: ril bu bya 'o brtul zhugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-8: nam mkha'i rdo ba'i chu nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-9: spyi bor thig le bcang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-10: nges par reg ste gdong bltas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-11: mi ni khrag tu skyug par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-12: k'a ka ma rtsi sbrang rtsi dkar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-13: khu byug dkar po'i mig gis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-14: nam mkha'i chu dang mnyam par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-15: spyi bo la ni thig le bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-16: thig le 'di yi byin rlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-17: dgra bo rnams ni dbang du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-18: gang du phyag ni 'tshal byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-19: de rnams nges par rmongs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-20: de nas gzhan yang rab sbyor te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-21: sbrul nag po yi lce dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-22: de bzhin sre mo'i lce nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-23: byi ba'i mkhris pa yang dag bsres //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-24: khri phrag lnga yi ril bu rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-25: thig le 'di yi byin rlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-26: dgra bo bran du byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-27: ma rungs 'khor dang bcas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-28: rgyal po rmongs par byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-29: de nas gzhan yang rab sbyor te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-30: 'chi med rtsa ba'i s'i ta ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-31: de bzhin ba hu d'a pha la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-32: 'di rnams mnyam po'i cha yis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-33: ril bu bya 'o mkhas pa yis; ;thig le 'di yis yang dag bzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-35: kha yis bdud rtsi blangs byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:445b-36: g-yon pa'i ming med kyis kyang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-2: aom ma h'a yaksha se na aa dhi pa ta ye ma h'a dur d'anta da ma g'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-3: n'a sha ya n'a sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-4: bi dr'a pa ya bi dr'a pa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-5: h'um h'um sarba dushta na phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-8: 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs la sogs pa'i sgrub thabs gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-9: aom h'um:dza: aa pa r'a dzi ta:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-11: aom h'um dza:aa pu ra na:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-12: aom h'um dza: aa pu ra na:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-13: aom shram dzashma sa na aa dhi pa ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-14: aom rum dza: ku le shva ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-15: aom h'um dza: buddhe shva ra:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-16: aom aam dza: ki ka ra autta ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-17: zhes pa 'di rnams 'byung po'i bdag po chen po rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-18: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-19: dpal rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin pa'i mdun du 'bum phrag bzla bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-21: de nas zla ba nya la mchod pa chen po byas nas zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-23: 'o ma sbyar ba'i zas dkar po rnams kyis ji ltar gsungs pa'i mchod pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-24: gu gul gyi dud pa byin nas mtshan mo mtha' dag bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-25: nges par tho rangs 'ongs par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-26: gal te 'ongs par ma gyur na skad cig de la 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-27: 'ongs nas kyang bdag gis ci bya zhes bka' stsal du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446a-28: sgrub pa pos bdag gi bran du mdzod ces smra bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446b-0: de nas brtsams te ci bya ba'i las rnams @446b byed de; rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal srid kyang ster ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446b-1: dgra rnams tshar gcod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446b-2: lha mo ri bong can blangs te ster bar byed cing rgyab tu khur te lha'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446b-3: brgya byin nyid ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446b-4: bskal pa bdun du 'tsho ba byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446b-5: de nas mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446b-6: mtshan mo mchod rten gyi mdun du 'dug ste zhag bdun du stong phrag brgyad bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446b-7: zhag brgyad pa la mchod pa chen po byas nas gtor ma phul te gu gul gyi dud ba dbul zhing bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446b-8: bzlas pa na nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446b-9: kye sgrub pa po bdag gis ci bya zhes so; ;sgrub pa po bdag gis ci bya ba khyod mkhyen no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446b-11: de nas brtsams nas ci bya ba'i las rnams byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446b-12: slar yang rgyal srid ster ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446b-13: lo stong phrag tu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446b-14: ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du ci bya ba'i las rnams byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446b-17: che ge 'chi bar gyis shig ces pa thams cad byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446b-18: de nas gsang ba'i sgrub thabs yin te; rdo rje 'dzin pa khang par song ste nyi ma bdun du stong phrag brgyad bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446b-19: nyi ma brgyad pa la mchod pa chen po byas nas zan zho dkar po ji ltar gsungs pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446b-20: mtshan phyed pa ji srid pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446b-21: ji srid mtshan phyed pa de nas rang nyid 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:446b-22: me tog gi mchod yon dbul bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-0: mnyes par gyur na rgyal srid ster zhing bsam pa thams @447a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-1: cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-2: de nas kun tu gsang ba'i sgrub thabs yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-3: gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du khri phrag bzla bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-5: de nas zla ba nya ba la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas mtshan phyed pa ji srid pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-6: de nas mtshan phyed na myur du 'ongs shing mdun du gnas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-7: kye mnyes gshin ci byed ces smra bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-8: sgrub pa pos bdag gis ci bya ba khyed mkhyen ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-9: de nas brtsams te ci bya ba'i las rnams byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-10: gnod sbyin gyi bu mo mchog bkug nas ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-11: 'dod ldan gyi mchog ston mo ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-12: nyi ma so sor bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-14: d'i n'a ra lnga rnams rab tu ster ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-15: lo lnga brgya rnams 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-16: de nas dur khrod bdag po'i sgrub thabs yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-17: mtshan mo dur khrod du song nas nyi ma bdun du stong phrag brgyad bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-18: nyi ma brgyad pa la nya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-26: 'bras bu ji ltar gsungs pa'i nyi bar mkho ba rnams kyi gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-27: gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-28: mtshan phyed pa de ji srid pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447a-29: de nas mtshan phyed nas ha ha'i sgra thos par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447b-0: 'khor dang bcas pa tshogs kyis yongs su @447b bskor nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447b-1: 'ongs pa na mchod pa dbul zhing mnyes par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447b-2: 'byung po thams cad bran du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447b-3: nyi ma nyi mar d'i n'a ra brgyad rnams rab tu ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447b-6: de nas rigs kyi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447b-7: lha'i gnas su song ste dri dang ldan pa'i me tog dmar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447b-8: gu gul gyi bdug pa byin nas khri phrag bzla bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447b-10: nag po'i phyogs la mtshan mor nya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447b-14: bza' ba dmar po'i cho ga gtor ma bzhin dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447b-15: tu ru ka'i bdug pa byin nas ji srid mtshan byed kyi bar du bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447b-16: de nas 'bar ba chen po zab cing 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447b-18: mnyes gshin ci byed ces smra bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447b-19: sgrub pa pos bdag gis ci bya ba khyed mkhyen ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447b-20: de nas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du ci bya ba'i las rnams byed do; ;nyi ma nyi mar thun gsum du d'i n'a ra lnga ster ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447b-21: 'dod pa'i lha rdzas kyi ston mo ster ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447b-22: lo lnga brgya 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447b-23: de nas 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447b-24: mtshan ma gcig par song ste gcig pus zhag gsum du mtshan mor bza' ba kha zas dmar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:447b-27: dzambu li ka'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-0: nyi ma gsum pa la rang nyid @448a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-1: myur du 'ong zhing mdun du gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-2: de 'di ltar bdag gis ci bya zhes smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-3: sgrub pa pos bdag gis ci bya ba khyed mkhyen ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-4: rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-5: nges par lha mo blangs nas ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-6: rang nyid kyis bza' ba dang gos blangs te rnam pa ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-7: lo stong phrag gnyis rnams 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-8: de nas pho nya mchog gi sgrub thabs yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-9: rdo rje 'dzin pa khang par song nas nag po'i bcu bzhi la bzlas pa khri bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-10: nyi ma bdun rnams su sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-11: de nas sgrub thabs brtsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-12: tsandan gyi mandal [?] byas nas gu gul gyi bdug pa byin la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-13: zho dang mar dkar po sbyar ba'i zas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-14: ku sha'i chun po la nye bar 'dug pas mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar te mtshan mor ji srid mtshan phyed gyur pa de srid bzla bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-15: rang nyid pho nya mchog tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-16: 'ongs pa na tsandan gyi chus mchod yon sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-17: mnyes par gyur na bdag gis ci bya zhes dri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-18: sgrub pa pos bdag gis ci bya ba khyed mkhyen ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-19: de nas brtsams te ci bya ba'i las rnams byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-20: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad rab tu ster ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-21: yid la 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448a-22: de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma sgrub pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448b-0: gro ga'i 'dab ma la gi wang gi gzugs brnyan bris te @448b gcig pu stan la 'dug nas bzlas pa stong phrag bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448b-1: de nas bzlas pa'i mthar mchod pa chen po byas nas mar gyi sgron me rab tu sbar te mi smra bar bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448b-2: de nas mtshan phyed nas nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448b-3: 'ongs pa na 'dod pa byas te chung mar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448b-4: lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang bza' ba la sogs pa gdan la bzhag ste 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448b-5: bud med dang 'grogs pa dor bar bya ste; gzhan du na rnam par 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448b-6: de nas ka na ka ma ti'i sgrub thabs yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448b-7: shing ba da'i rtsa bar song nas nya dang sha'i gtor ma cho gas dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448b-8: bdag nyid kyang 'thungs te lhag mas mchod yon sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448b-9: stong phrag gcig bzla bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448b-10: 'di ltar zhag bdun gyi mtshan mo rang nyid 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448b-11: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'khor brgya phrag gsum dang mnyam du 'di rnams mtshan phyed nas nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448b-12: 'ongs pa na 'dod pa byas te chung mar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448b-13: skye ba bcu gnyis rnams kyi gos dang rgyan dang bza; ba rnams ster ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448b-14: nyi ma so sor d'i n'a ra brgyad rnams rab tu ster ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448b-15: de nas dga' ma'i sgrub thabs yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448b-16: ri mo mkhan la gan la thang sku bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448b-17: gser gyis mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448b-18: phyag g-yas na autpal can dz'a ti'i me tog gis mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:448b-19: gu gul gyi bdug pa byin pa stong phrag brgyad bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-1: ltar 'byor ba'i mchod ba byas nas mar gyi sgron me rab tu sbar te ji srid mtshan phyed de srid par bzlas pa bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-3: 'ongs nas mi smra bar 'dod pa byas te chung mar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-5: lha rdzas kyi 'dod pa dang ston mo rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-6: dngul chu'i bcud len rnams ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-7: d'i n'a ra nyi shu rtsa lnga ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-8: de nas padma ma ni'i sgrub thabs yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-9: rang gi khyim du spyi bo'i gnas su tsandan gyi mandal byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-10: gu gul gyi bdug pa byin nas stong phrag gcig tshad bzla bar bya'o; ;de nas zla ba nya la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas ji srid mtshan phyed pa de srid du bzlas pa bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-12: 'ongs pa na 'dod pa byas te chung mar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-13: lha rdzas kyi 'dod pa rab tu ster zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-15: grub pa'i rdzas kyang ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-16: de nas ral gcig ma'i sgrub thabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-17: 'di las yang dag rab bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-18: gnod sbyin mo rnams sgrub dus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-19: ral gcig man i rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-20: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-21: gri gug thod pa 'dzin pa mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-22: sku mdog sngon mo 'jigs byed che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-23: bha ga'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-24: shar du dzambha la bsam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-25: nor 'dzin yang ni lho ru ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-26: chu dbang nub tu dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-27: byang du tsi bi kunda li //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449a-28: me la sogs pa'i zur du yang ///
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-0: @449b gnod sbyin mo bzhi rnam bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-1: kunda la ha t'i n'i ro hi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-2: mdzes ma cho gas dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-3: de nas sgo skyong bsam bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-4: dbyug pa la sogs mtha' dag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-5: ji ltar snga ma'i 'khor lo mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-6: de ltar kha dog rab sbyar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-7: thams cad gtso bo'i mtshan ma 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-8: slar yang phyi nas bsngags bzlas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-9: aom ae ka dza ti ba su s'a dha n'i sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-10: de nas phukka s'i'i sgrub thabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-11: 'di las yang dag rab bshad bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-12: skad cig gang gis bsgoms tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-14: sku mdog ser skya zhal bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-15: phyag bzhi bong bu la zhon pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-16: bsgom bya pukka s'i yi las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-17: bya rog tho ba mda' dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-18: gzhu rnams bsgom bya brtul zhugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-21: de nas 'jam pa'i rdo rje yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-22: sgrub thabs yang dag rab bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-23: 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa las skad cig las mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-25: gnod sbyin mo sgrub pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-26: de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos //nyal ba slong bar byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-27: sbrul gyi sos btab la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-28: srung ba'i gsang sngags las gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-29: 'bum phrag bzhi ni bzlas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-30: don grub sa bon bsags rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:449b-31: nyal ba slong bar byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-2: zhi ba gshin rje gshed dkar po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-3: rtag tu rnal 'byor rigs rnams bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-4: phyag tu don grub sa bon rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-5: 'bum phrag bzhir ni bzla bar bya; ;sos btab yang dag kha bltas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-6: nyungs kar gyis ni brab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-7: gal te gang gis bzung ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-8: the tshom med par ldang bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-9: h'um yig kha dog dkar po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-10: bsgrub bya'i snying gar bsam bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-11: hr'i:shtri: la sogs sngags bzla zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-12: 'od zer rnams kyis dug dgug bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-13: phyag g-yas de bzhin g-yon pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-15: de dbus su yang h'um yig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-17: de nyid kyis ni spyi bor yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-19: mkhas pas ha yig bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-21: byugs pas dug ni dgug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-23: sngags kyis spyi bo nas brtsams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-24: rkang mthar bya ba sngags bzlas kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-25: bdud rtsi'i char pa bsgoms bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-26: 'tsho bar yang ni the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-27: sa bon yi ge rdzogs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-28: 'dzin pa bcings pa'i mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-29: kha dog ser po yang dag byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-30: sos btab gnas la nges par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-31: aom yig dang po tsheg drag mtha'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-32: cho ga nges sbyar ha tha dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-33: dug gi bya bas bcings pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450a-34: sbyor ba rnams kyis bcings pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-0: spyi bor gser 'joms legs @450b par rtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-1: de ltar gzhan rnams kyang g-yan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-3: dmu chu la sogs pa gos pa legs par tshar gcod pa'i rab tu sbyor ba mang pos kyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-4: de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-5: srung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-6: bgegs dang log 'dren gdug pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-7: dgug pa'i don phyir yang gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-8: bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-9: srung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-10: 'bar ba'i sku dang dbyug pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-11: lus gsum las skyes dgas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-12: skyob pa sangs rgyas rnams kun gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-13: lha mo khyod ni dpang por gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-15: bdag ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-16: gos kyis gdong ba bcings nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-17: dkyil 'khor khang pa'i nang bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-18: kye khyod su zhes brjod bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-19: bdag skal bzang zhes smra bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-20: blo bzang yol ba nang byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-21: bla ma mchog la gsol btab bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-22: dbang bskur don du gus chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-23: mgon po'i rjes su gsum brjod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-24: ji ltar sangs rgyas chos chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-25: rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-26: bdag la mgon pos yang dag dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-27: mchog kyang bdag la stsal du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-28: glu dang rol mos de bzhin mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-29: mchod yon zhabs bsil de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-30: slob mas mchod pa la dbul bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-31: yang na der ni bstod pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-32: de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:450b-33: stong nyid yang dag gsung bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-1: n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-2: aom pu dza bdzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-3: aom dha rma dh'a tu sva bh'a pa a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-4: de nas sbyin sreg rab bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-5: zhib la sogs rab dbye las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-7: las kun rab tu sgrub pa po'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-8: zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-9: rgyas pa'i sems kyis rgyas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-10: rab dga' sems kyis dbang la nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-11: drag po yis ni gsod pa la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-12: zlum po rnam pa zhi ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-13: rdzing bu rnam pa rgyas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-14: dbang la zla ba phyed par brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-15: mkha' khams mdog can gsad pa la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-16: zhi ba la ni khru gang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-17: de bzhin khru gnyis rgyas pa la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-18: ji ltar rgyas pa de bzhin dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-19: sor mo nyi shu gsad pa la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-20: khru phyed brtsigs pa zhi ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-21: rgyas pa la ni khru gang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-22: lnga gnyis gsad pa las byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-23: ji ltar dgug pa de bzhin dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-24: zhi pa'i sbyin sreg tshes gcig la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-25: zla ba nya la rgyas pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-26: bcu bzhi pa la mngon spyod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-27: brgyad pa la ni dbang gi las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-28: shel dang nya phyis zhi ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-29: mu tig 'bras bu rab bsngags te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-30: dung dang bo de tsi ta dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-31: nad med pa la mi rus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-32: tsandan dmar pos bsgos pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-33: byi ru yi ni khyad par las; ;drag mig lung thang de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-34: mi rus n'a ga pha ni yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-35: brgya phrag gcig ni zha ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-36: de bzhin brgyad lhag rgyas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451a-37: dbang dang dgug pa nyi shu lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-0: drug cu rtsa bzhi @451b mngon spyod la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-1: brgya phyed sngags kyis bsgrub pa la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-2: ril bu rgyu bar bya sngags la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-3: phreng ba rnams ni thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-4: de bzhin lhun po gnyis rgyu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-5: zhi ba mdzub mo la bzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-6: gung mo la ni rgyas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-7: dbang dang dgug pa ming med la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-8: tshar gcad pa ni mthe chung la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-9: kha dog dkar po zhi ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-10: kha dog ser po rgyas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-11: dbang la dmar po rtag bsam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-12: nges par gsod la nag po 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-14: sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o;;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-15: /rnal 'byor bzhi dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-19: btung ba la sogs pa yang dag par ldan pa'i dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-27: ba dan la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par gang ba'i rol mo'i sgra chen po lnga bsgom par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-28: mdun du gtor ma'i snod skyogs sam zangs gzhong gi nang du bza' ba tsam bcas pa'i chu khyor pa gsum ji ltar rnyed pa'i dam tshig gi rdzas dang ldan pa bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-29: de rab tu gsal bar drung du bzhag la sgom pa brtsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:451b-30: nam mkha'i dbyings su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa ze ba dang bcas pa bsgom par ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452a-0: @452a *// ze 'bru la yam yig las rlung gi dkyil 'khor kha dog sngon po gzhu'i dbyibs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452a-1: mtha' gnyis su g-yo ba'i ba dan dang rgyal mtshan brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o; ;de'i steng du ram yig dmar po las skyes pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa dmar po zur gsum la ram yig gis mtshan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452a-2: de'i steng du ru yig gsum yongs su gyur pa las mgo po gsum gyi sgyed bu la gnas pa'i a'a:yig dmar po las skyes pa'i padma'i snod phyi dkar la nang dmar pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452a-3: der padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i rnam pa bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452a-4: de la shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma la bhr'um aam dzim kham h'um gi yi ges rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452a-5: de bzhin du me la sogs pa'i zur du l'am m'am p'am t'am b'am gyi yi ges spyan ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnams bsam par bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452a-6: yi ge bcu po 'di rnams yongs su gyur pa las go ku da ha na rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452a-7: bi ra shu m'a m'u zhes pa 'di rnams kyi yi ge rnams kyis mtshan pa'i dam tshig gi rdzas bcu po 'di rnams padma'i snod du blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452a-8: de'i steng du aom yig kha dog dkar po des bkab pa'i rang bzhin bsams la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452a-9: aom yig las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452b-0: de'i steng du h'um yig dkar po las byung ba'i dbyug pa de'i sa bon gyis mtshan pa blta bar @452b bya'o; ;de nas slar padma'i snod las 'og gi sgyed bu la aom a'a:h'um lan gsum bzlas shing brjod la bsgoms te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452b-1: snga ma bar ma chad par rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed de me'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'bar bas gdungs shing bskol te spar bas 'bar ba'i gong bu la sogs pa dam tshig gi rdzas bcu'i rang bzhin mtha' dag zhu bas rdo rje'i dbyug pas dkrugs pa blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452b-2: de nas slar rdo rje'i dbyug pa zhu bar gyur te bdud rtsi nyi ma 'char kha'i kha dog gam dngul chu'i rnam par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452b-3: de las slar aom a'a:h'um gi yi ge gsum las thon pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams kyis khams gsum ma lus pa la gnas pa'i bdud rtsi shin tu mang bar blangs par bsgom zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452b-4: de nyid rab tu gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452b-5: de nyid rab tu bcug pa la mkha'i rnam pa shin tu gsal ba'i tshogs bsil ba'i sbrang rtsi 'dus pa'i gzugs su brtan par bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452b-6: phyi nas yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452b-7: kha dog dri ro phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452b-8: dri med ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452b-9: ye shes bdud rtsir rab sbyor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452b-10: 'bad nas gtor ma rdzogs byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452b-11: gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'i sngags pa khro bo phyag na zhags pa dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa sbros nas phyogs skyong rnams kyi snying la lcags kyus phug cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:452b-12: mgul ba la zhags pas bcings te bkug par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-0: de nas aom hr'i:shtr'i:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um @453a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-1: phat phat dushta aindram sa pa ri w'a ra a'a karsha ya dza /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-2: sngags 'dis mig stong pa dkar ser glang po che dkar po'i gdan la g-yas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-3: gcig shos na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-4: sdigs mdzub mdzad pa bkug ste shar du gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-5: sngags de nyid kyis nye dbang mkha' lding gi gdan la rin po che'i cod pan can g-yas na be con dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-6: g-yon na drung dang koo stu bha 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-7: de nyid kyi g-yon du ha cang mi ring bar gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-8: yang de nyid kyis gshin rje ma he la zhon pa dbyug pa 'dzin pa lho ru gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-9: yang de'i nyid kyis chu lha kha dog dkar po brang 'gro la zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-10: phyag na klu'i zhags pa can nub tu gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-11: yang de nyid kyis lus ngan ser po gter la gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-12: phyag na b'i dza p'u ra ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-13: na ku li can byang du gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-14: de nyid kyis glang sna dkar po byi ba la gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-15: g-yas na bgrang phreng dang dgra sta 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-16: g-yon na la phug dang la du 'dzin pa dbang ldan du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-17: de nyid kyis dbang phyug dkar po khyu mchog la zhon pa ral pa 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-18: phyag na rtse gsum dang thod pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-19: phyag gnyis dkar mo la 'khyud pa dbang ldan du gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-20: yang de nyid kyis me lha dmar por la gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-21: phyag na bgrang phreng dang sbyi blugs can mer gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453a-22: yang de nyid kyis srin po rol zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453b-0: phyag na gri gug dang thod pa can sngon po mi sdug pa khro ba dang bcas pa bden bral du @453b gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453b-1: yang de nyid kyis rlung lha du ba'i mdog can ri dvags ser po la gnas pa rlung du gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453b-2: yang de nyid kyis nyi ma dmar po phyag gnyis kyis padma 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453b-3: rta bdun la gnas pa steng du gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453b-4: yang de nyid kyis zla ba dkar po phyag gnyis kyis ku mud 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453b-5: shing rta la gnas pa steng du gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453b-6: yang de nyid kyis tshangs pa ser po zhal bzhi pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453b-10: bgrang phreng 'dzin pa ral bas brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453b-11: ngang pa la gnas pa steng du gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453b-12: yang de nyid kyis sa'i lha mo padma la gnas pa g-yon na bum pa 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453b-13: phyag g-yas na dam bcas khas len pa 'og tu gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453b-14: yang de nyid kyis thags bzang ris sngon po shing rta la gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453b-15: g-yas pa dang gcig shos na ral gri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453b-16: sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa de nyid du gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453b-17: de nas khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs phyag na phur bu 'dzin pa rnams la khro bo mgrin pa 'phyang ba nyid thugs ka'i sa bon gyis bkug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453b-18: de rnams kyi snying ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453b-20: sbyi bo rnams su rkang pa'i mtha' yang sngags 'dis bur bu gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453b-21: aom hr'i:sht'i:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sarba a'indra a'a d'i na k'i la ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:453b-22: ces pas phur bu btab pa'i mthar grub pa'i bcud bsdus la lha de rnams thams cad kyang gshin rje mthar byed kyi rnam par bskyed par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454a-0: byang chub kyi sems khu bas @454a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454a-1: sam; yang na de'i tshe sa bon dang mtshan ma'i rim pas bskyed par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454a-2: de las sa bon hr'i: yig las rdzogs pa dbang po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454a-3: sa bon shtr'i: las rdzogs pa gshin rje'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454a-4: sa bon wi las rdzogs pa chu lha'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454a-5: sa bon kri yig las rdzogs pa lus ngan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454a-6: sa bon ta yig las rdzogs pa dbang ldan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454a-7: sa bon a'a yig las rdzogs pa me lha'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454a-8: sa bon na yig las rdzogs pa bden bral lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454a-9: sa bon na yig las rdzogs pa rlung lha'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454a-10: sa bon h'um yig las rdzogs pa zla ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454a-11: sa bon h'um yig las rdzogs pa nyi ma'o; ;sa bon phat yig las rdzogs pa tshangs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454a-12: sa bon phat yig las rdzogs pa nor 'dzin ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454a-13: sa bon sv'a yig las rdzogs pa thags bzang ris so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454a-14: sa bon h'a yig las rdzogs pa 'byung po thams cad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454a-16: de ltar bskyed de rnam par bsams nas de rnams kyi mig la sogs pa rnams la gnas ji lta bar mig la sogs pa bskyed cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454a-17: lus la sogs pa rnams la sku rdo rje la sogs pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454a-18: gshin rje mthar byed kyi cod pan nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454a-19: dang po mchod yon bsang gtor dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul phyi nas gtor ma'i yo byad bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i rim pas sngon du ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454a-20: de nyid gsum gyis mngon par bsngags shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-0: slar de rnams kyi sngags kyi rab tu sbyong ba rnam par bsams @454b la phyi nas sngags 'dis bdud rtsi dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-1: aom rakta mu ku n'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-6: rakta munda m'a l'a bha ra n'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-7: rakta ra tha sa m'a ru dh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-8: rakta padma a'a sa n'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-9: rakta bha ra na bhu sha n'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-10: ai dam ba lim grihna grihna /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-11: ma ma bighn'am ha ra ha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-12: tsa tur m'a r'a na ni ba r'a ya ni b'a ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-13: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-14: bhra ma ya bhra ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-17: n'a sha ya n'a sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-18: sho sha ya sho sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-21: h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-22: phyi nas yan lag so sos dbul bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-23: aom aindra ya na ma: hr'i:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-25: ba ru n'a ya na ma:wi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-26: ku be r'a ya na ma kri/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-27: a'i shra ra ya na ma: ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-29: nee ri dya ya na ma na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-30: bha ya be na ma: na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-34: ba su dha r'a ye na ma: phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-35: bee ma tsi tri nee na ma sv'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-36: sarba bhu te bhyo na ma h'a: ha ha ha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-43: lha bshos la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-44: de rnams la sgrub pa pos phul ba'i bcud thams cad gsol zhing nye bar longs spyod par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-45: de gnas pa rnams la rdo rje gsor la 'gyid ba dang bcas par dril bu 'khrol zhing bstod pa byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-46: gti mug dga' ma la sogs pas mngon par 'dod pas gsol ba gdab cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-47: bzhad pa rnam pa brgyad kyi sngags brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:454b-49: ha ha he he ho ho h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-2: phyi nas sgrub pa po'i mngon par 'dod pa yang mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-3: khyod kyis sems can thams cad don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-4: ji lta'i rjes mthun grub pa stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-5: sangs rgyas yul du gse mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-6: slad nas kyang ni 'byon par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-8: gtor ma'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-9: de nas nges par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' chen po la bstod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-10: gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-11: shin tu 'jigs rung gshin rje gshed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-12: ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-13: sku yi rdo rjer phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-14: phra ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-15: shin tu 'jigs rung gshin rje gshed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-16: thugs kyi rdo rje rab gsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-17: rin chen rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-18: 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-20: dbyangs mchog kun gyi mchog gi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-21: gsung gi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-22: phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-23: las kun byed pa'i gshin rje gshed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-24: sku yi rdo rje rab gsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-25: phyag na ral gri khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-26: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-27: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455a-28: sangs rgyas kun rab mchog gi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455b-4: rdo rje thugs zhes gsungs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i sbyan la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'i dam tshig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-024:455b-6: de nas drag shul gshin rje gshed //
